name: Isla Noir
description:
Hi, folks! My name is Nikko. I'm the developer of this game. Which really isn’t much more than an environment at the moment, something I cooked up just for fun. It's actually a few years old now, too. This was made in 2015 with Unity 5. You can read more about that here.

I keep thinking about this project, though. The idea still excites me, and I would like to eventually develop it out further. For now, I'd just like to take the opportunity to share it with y'all. I know it ain't much, but if it sparks even the smallest amount joy in your heart, then I'll consider the effort worth while.

Thank you for your interest. If you enjoyed the experience, maybe consider tossin' a few coin my way.

I appreciate the support. Thanks for playing!
